import React, {Component} from 'react'; import {Input, Container, Header, Icon, Accordion, Card, Image, Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import sampleImage from '../images/square-image.png'; import matthew from '../images/matthew.png'; class AccountTab extends Component{ state = {activeIndex: 0} handleClick = (e, titleProps) => { const {index} = titleProps const {activeIndex} = this.state const newIndex = activeIndex === index ? -1 : index this.setState({ activeIndex: newIndex }) } render(){ const {activeIndex} = this.state; return(
Pending Users Michael Myers Nurse University of Sto. Tomas

Class of 2014

Active Users
); } } export default AccountTab;
